name: Multiplication Tables : Maths Games for Kids
description: Multiplication App for Kids is an ad-free app for kids to help them learn Multiplication Tables from 1 to 20. It allows kids to improve their multiplication skills by helping them learn all the multiplication tables thoroughly. It is the best app to not only learn but test your childs multiplication tables. Through the test section of the app, parents can also monitor their childs learning progress. Through this app, your maths homework wont be a headache anymore! A perfect app for kids in grades 1 - 3.  Key Features of the App : - Free to download and try out - Completely Ad-Free - Kids Safe - Interactive graphics to keep kids involved in learning - The app has two modes: Learn & Test - Every Multiplication Table is spoken aloud to reinforce learning in the child - Multiplication Tables from 1 - 5 are free to try. Remaining Tables are available through a single in-app purchase
